cab.content: CONFIDENTIAL.0*j :This Document is the Pj P.?ilOlPARAPHRASE - Tii-LLG-RAil from the Got era or General ofNew Zealand to the Secretary of State for the Colonies.(Received Colonial Office 9.53 euru 6th March 19*0)Secret. My telegram 6th Februarye ,?7ith reference to suggestion made in your cypher telegram & 22nd January my Prime Minister states that after careful consideration Hew Zealand Government deoided not to take any action at the present time in tha direction of appointing representative of Hew Zealand in London for League nations purposes.LIVERPOOL.
